thread.title: Man sustains severe burns after water park explosion
thread.title_full: Man sustains severe burns after water park explosion - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi
title: Man sustains severe burns after water park explosion
text:
MONT VERNON, N.H. (AP) â€” The family of a New Hampshire man fighting for his life after being severely burned in an explosion at a water park in Taiwan says his condition is worsening.
The family of 26-year-old Alex Haas of Mont Vernon tells WMUR ( http://bit.ly/1RbLzWM ) that he been treated well at the Taiwan hospital , but needs American medical care as soon as possible.
Haas suffered second- and third-degree burns over 90 percent of his body when a firestorm erupted after a flammable powder substance blew up over a stage at the water park June 28. Two women have died and 200 others remain in intensive care.
Haas's family has launched a GoFundMe page and is hoping to raise enough money to bring him home to be cared for in the U.S.
___
Information from: WMUR-TV, http://wmur.com
